name: Relic (University of Chester Games Development)
description:
Relic is a 3D, first person puzzle game inspired by the shrines in The Legend of
Zelda: Breath of the Wild and other puzzle related games like Portal 2. You must navigate through multiple physics based puzzles to escape with the treasure, the Gauntlet (Eli).

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

This game was created by a team of level 5 students for a second year collaborative module. Students work in teams to create a game whilst learning development skills and project management methodologies.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Space to jump
  • Left Mouse Button (click) interact with objects
  • Left Mouse Button (hold) to pickup and move objects
  • Q move picked up objects further away
  • E move picked up objects closer

REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows PC
  • Mouse + Keyboard

TEAM MEMBERS

  • Level 5 Students

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.
